column2: [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s initial haven defenses have been penetrated but they are too powerful or lucky to be captured.  You may choose to attack them or send a loyal general to finish them off.  What will it be?
Attack [imprison_target.GetHerHim]. (This will place you at risk)
Choose a general to lead the attack.
Call it off.
Call it off.

If you attack choose to lead the attack against [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] you will put yourself at risk.  However, should you succeed, you will diablerize them and gain their blood power if it is stronger than yours.  Do you proceed to lead the attack?
Yes.
No.
Your long years of unlife have led you to become comfortable with your immortality.  Unfortunately this complacency made your guard slip and an enemy has used the occasion to attack you.  You...
... have been defeated!
... stave off the attack but are forced into torpor!
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker injured.
... foil the attack, leaving both you and the attacker maimed.
... foil the attack, slaying the person leading the attack!
Your attack to diablerize [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.
Excellent!
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.
Next time...
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  However, they succumbed to torpor shortly after escaping.  Your involvement is known.
Next time...
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  You have both suffered injuries.
Curses!
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] managed to escape your vicious attack.  You have both suffered grievous injuries.!
Curses!
You have died during your attack on [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]!
Who will you send to organize and lead the attack on [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s haven?
Send one of your ghouls.
Ghoul a talented thug.
Call it off.
Which ghoul will lead the attack on [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s haven?
[ghoul_number_1.GetTitledFirstName].
[ghoul_number_2.GetTitledFirstName].
[ghoul_number_3.GetTitledFirstName].
Call it off.

Your long years of unlife have led you to become comfortable with your immortality.  Unfortunately this complacency made your guard slip and an enemy force has attacked your haven during the day!  Your forces...
... have been defeated!
... stave off the attack but you are forced into torpor!
... foil the attack, leaving one of your courtiers dead.
... foil the attack, leaving both a courtier and the attacker dead.
... foil the attack, slaying the person leading the attack!
Your haven attack against [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.
Excellent!
Your haven attack against [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] has succeeded.  It is known they died by your orders.
Excellent!

[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to spirit away their master during the attack on their haven.  However, [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] succumbed to torpor shortly afterwards.
Next time...

[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  However, [imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName] succumbed to torpor shortly afterwards.  Your involvement is known.
Next time...
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  One of their servants died and [imprison_attacking_char.GetTitledFirstName] lived.
Curses!

[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  One of their servants died and [imprison_attacking_char.GetTitledFirstName] lived.  Your involvement is known.
Curses!
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  Both a servant and [imprison_attacking_char.GetTitledFirstName] died.
Curses!
[imprison_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s forces managed to repel your attack on their haven.  Both a servant and [imprison_attacking_char.GetTitledFirstName] died.  Your involvement is known.
Curses!

Curses!

Call it off.
